Name: Loot Train
About the game: The Loot Train is a nigh-infinitely long train that is a host to countless passengers and valuables. It would be a shame if someone were to commit murder for no other reason than to become rich... Gameplay Loot Train is a randomly generated Rogue-Lite with heavy emphasis on game knowledge. You take control of a Hooded Thief, of mysterious origin, to ransack the Loot Train and its passengers. Explore different themed areas on the train, with a whole slew of zany enemies. Discover equippable items with various unique effects to empower your pillage so you can successfully slay a conductor. Features 300+ unique items 32 challenging bosses 5 character classes Character leveling system In depth stat screen Minor platforming gameplay Unique pixel art style Item crafting system Tons of odd characters Collectable card gacha system
